website_summaries.verdict: Perfect road inner tubes for smaller 24-inch wheels commonly found on young adult road bicycles.
pros: Provides a decent amount of puncture resistance for the occasional small thorn
Easy to install on most bike rims
Designed to fit most regular road tires and some mountain bike tires
cons: Will not fit smaller children's bikes
Not suitable for smaller road tires

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy fix. Don't bother taking you bike to the shop for $40 to get a new tire. This took less than 10 minutes to install, even with my 9 year old daughter helping. You will need a Tire Lever to make life easier. I had one on me and it helped, though I think a flat-head screwdriver would work. Tons of videos on YouTube can show you how to do it. Just be sure to order the right size. Look on the side wall of your wheel for dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT self sealing
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as self-sealing and it’s not. Buy the “Slime” products for self-sealing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Warren

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: It's a bike tube, so there's really not a lot to say. I ordered the correct size and it fit as expected. It inflated and has thus far stayed inflated. The quality seems good. I figure it'll last as long as any other tube. It's for my 8-year-old's 24" Giant XTC Jr trail bike. Works great. I ordered a second one to keep on hand for the next inevitable flat.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Wangler

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole already in it....
customer_reviews.text: My poor son needed a new tube, I buy one, and then install it. Pump it up, works great....... for 10 min. then it is flat. he was going in our grass yard.... no nails... no staples.... just a bad tube to start.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Good quality inner tube, fits a variety of widths
customer_reviews.text: Mountain bike inner tube was flat. There were not a lot of bargain choices in the 24 inch size. The Bell standard tube was very inexpensive. Took a while to arrive, but the quality was very good. There is nothing unusual about this tube. If you are accustomed to changing a bike inner tube this one will work exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: allyk

customer_reviews.title: Packaging problem
customer_reviews.text: Good tube, good price. Only issue was packaging - hard to open the shrink wrap on the actual tube, and using scissors or other tool to pierce the wrap would risk puncturing that tube. In this case the excessive packaging could actually cause the item to be damaged - no need!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Walls

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bike tube
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bike cube as always. I bought this brand for a few times in the last 10 years. They worked well. BTW, I own 7 bikes. I would like to store a couple of these tubes in case. The price is reasonable, too.
customer_reviews.author: X-man

customer_reviews.title: Used the Standard tube in my daughter's beach cruiser
customer_reviews.text: Used the Standard tube in my daughter's beach cruiser. The loose fit of her tires on the rim made it a pretty simple tube swap. It has been holding air for about 2 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Bicycle Repair
customer_reviews.text: The product took longer than expected due to some type of mixup but when it arrived, it was the exact product we needed. This same product was being sold a local vendor for twice the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Padron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and like OEM
customer_reviews.text: It's a bike tire for a basic kid's big bike. My 11yo son and I changed his tire and he put it on and did a lot of the work. Will report back on durability.
customer_reviews.author: A River Town Dock Man

customer_reviews.title: Got a tear before I even got the tire back on
customer_reviews.text: I should have just paid a few bucks more to get a better tire tube. The dag-nab thing got a gash from the slightest of touches as I put it in the track with my flathead. Guess I'll be going to WalMart to get a better product. If I was you, I would skip on this headache.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby S

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective batch of tubes.
customer_reviews.text: Received a batch of bad tubes. 2 of the 3 developed leaks on the very first ride. The seam failed and caused failure on both. One about 7 inches from the valve, the other about 12 inches from the valve. Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Universal Bike Tube
customer_reviews.text: This tube is well made, the seams are very strong and after installation I no longer have a concern of getting a flat tire for no reason. Will buy again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find Anything bike related but I'm glad I found it, fits right, fast shipping and the price is about the same as stores which they all out
customer_reviews.author: flora klucewicz

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this replacement tube for a bike. No issues with it at all. Arrived on time, packaged securely, and the item itself seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 both had slow leaks on seams
customer_reviews.text: Both went flat after a day...too bad. One went flat without being used..
customer_reviews.author: Kim&Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Quick ship. This one has lasted several months. It's a inner tube and it works. If it helps anyone I have a 24" Sun adult tricycle. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Casey T.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked by the seam
customer_reviews.text: This is a very poorly made product. Within a week of installing (hardly 2 miles of riding), I had a flat and upon inspecting, I noticed a tear by the seam, 2 or 3 inches away from the valve. I did patch that spot, but now I see another spot where the air is leaking and its also on the seam. Either these tubes are pure garbage or its a QC issue.
customer_reviews.author: coolcat

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My husband put it on in a short time and said it was not hard. Low cost and ease to install..
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Tubs fitted our Schwinn beach cruiser on 24” tires.
customer_reviews.text: Fitment was great and hold air without any issues. Installation was easy and the tubes came in without being damaged or having any pre-existing holes or damage.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E

customer_reviews.title: Bicycle chamber replacement
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement chamber. Not self healing. Had to repair this weekend after rolling over small cactus needles.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Meilhon

customer_reviews.title: great tire for my adult trike.
customer_reviews.text: great tire works better and lasts longer than the original tire tube that came with the adult trike.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Bell makes great bicycle tubes.
customer_reviews.text: Bell makes quality bicycle tubes and Motorcycle helmets. Quality tube In an uncommon size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: holds air
customer_reviews.text: it's a bike tube. I use continental tire with puncture protection so who knows if this does anything or not. It inflates and holds air
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: fits well
customer_reviews.text: not like a lot of them that are too big to fit inside the tire
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: What a rip off!
customer_reviews.text: The product's quality is terrible. It did not last for more than one day! I requested a return and sent back the tube but never refunded. It's been almost a month since the return, and I didn't hear back from the seller. If this product was fulfilled by Amazon, I could've had a much better experience.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Here’s the deal with self sealing anything-
customer_reviews.text: If you’re not certain if it’s working or not, it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great price and easy instal !
customer_reviews.text: Totally recommend way easy to install and great price !
customer_reviews.author: aliza moreno

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So easy my 12 year old son installed. Found it cheaper the next day in store.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: i didnt get it in a bell branded packing but for what it is it is ok sadly though i had to fill it with some fix a flat do to thorn head around where i was cycling
customer_reviews.author: Christian James Morris

customer_reviews.title: These tire tubes are great!! I had to replace mine as my ...
customer_reviews.text: These tire tubes are great!! I had to replace mine as my daughter decided to ride her bike and popped both of them! The replacements went on super easy and inflated perfectly! I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ccinca33

customer_reviews.title: Bell bike tube
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bell Standard and Self Sealing Bike Tubes as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: JCA

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I had never change the inner tube of my bicycle before, so having the instructions was definitely helpful. It took me longer than I expected, but because my bike it was the first time I did it. I changed the tube four months ago and it's still in perfect condition. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: works like it should
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, as of july, 2019 it still holds air!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Replaced 24" Mongoose Tube.  Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced stock 24" Mongoose Tube that burst at the seam in the middle. Works great. Holding up well. Well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it zero stars I would.
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived today. My son rode his bike for 30 minuets and it went flat. Definitely not reliable. Didn’t run through a single thorn or anything rough!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica  Hughes

customer_reviews.title: PRICE AND FIT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for price came fast and can ride bike again.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia S

customer_reviews.title: This is a durable tube and easy to replace
customer_reviews.text: This Is a great tube to replace a blown out tube! It was easy to install and the thickness is durable. We liked it so much we ordered another one so we don’t have to keep repairing the front tire. It came quickly too! Great product
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: After 1 month of use, the inner tube exploded on its own.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month of use, the inner tube exploded on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: works great. did not have any more issues with goat thorns like before
customer_reviews.text: works great. did not have any more issues with goat thorns like before
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: FIxed a free bike for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a bike I picked up on the side of the road. Easy fix and they work great so far!
customer_reviews.author: StephenE

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 ain't bad.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these and 1 is bad. 1 tube is not holding air. Not sure if I will buy this 1 to replace the bad one or buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Nilson

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: First one was defective but was quickly replaced. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Young

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Product looked well made. It was easy to install and no more leaking air so the bike is usable again!
customer_reviews.author: mg259

customer_reviews.title: Inner Tube damaged
customer_reviews.text: One of the 2 inner tubes had a hole in it. This left my son very upset, since his dad wasn’t able to fix the tire. Very frustrating to get something in the mail & it’s damaged. Worst part is seeing your child upset, because their bike can’t get fixed right away. I wouldn’t give this any stars, but it makes you select at least one.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bove

customer_reviews.title: One month later & tube still holding pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Quickly delivered. Installed on wife's adult trike. One month later and tube still holding pressure. Good tube for price.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Very u happy with this 24 inch replacement tube
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic and great price for a quick tube replacement on a 24 inch mountain bike for a 10-year-old girl. We're very happy with it. We live in South Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Taking Action!

customer_reviews.title: Sliding Tube/ Broken Vale Stem
customer_reviews.text: The tube itself was thicker than the original that came with my bike, which is good. The problem is, the tubing would gradually slide out of place & bend the vale stem. Eventually the vale stem broke. The tire also had a very strong overpowering rubber scent that still seems to be there several months later.
customer_reviews.author: MarvinsRoommate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for casual riders
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 mountain bikes, with 3 flat tires and needed an economical way to replace them all. Walmart's tube prices were a bit too steep for me so I checked amazon. Bell is a known brand and with good pricing, I took a risk. It's been about 6 months now and the tubes are still holding up for ocassional weekend rides.
customer_reviews.author: D.Snake

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Install
customer_reviews.text: ... but I guess it's never easy to install a tube. Just follow the directions and have everything handy, and you should be fine. Unfortunately, the day after I installed it, my other tire went flat (again), so I just gave up and haven't touched that bike since. But it probably would've held up fine :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and product as promised. Delayed arrival by 1-2 weeks due to no fault of seller (it came with other items from different sellers)
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Apple

customer_reviews.title: No Defects, Worked As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Try opening them upside down; there's an easter egg, really great touch.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a huge hole in it. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Timika E Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Tube lasted 4 month - ruptured on inside seam
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment to end up with a hold not on the outside due to nail/etc. but it gave out on the inside seam.
customer_reviews.author: SHORE

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: My children as constantly going through bike tires, these have held up longer than any other brand I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit great on our bicycle rim
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on our bicycle rim. The flange was long enough to fit properly without having to force the pump end into it.
customer_reviews.author: KaTaHaR

customer_reviews.title: Got a flat a day later
customer_reviews.text: It is fine as far as a tube goes, but it went flat a day later when a sticker or brier hit my son's tire. My next tube was a self-healing one. I really recommend you spend the extra few dollars and get one of those instead.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Master

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seal
customer_reviews.text: They fit but didnt self seal like they were supposed too
customer_reviews.author: A. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Inner tube works!
customer_reviews.text: Fit my cruiser perfectly 24x1.75 bmx back on the road!
customer_reviews.author: DDouble

customer_reviews.title: I bought about 10 of these...
customer_reviews.text: I bought about 10 of these... either I have too many bikes or I pop my tires too often
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Calvani

customer_reviews.title: The quality of tube is not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tube in July and I rode the bike for just less than 5 times, the tube is broken and leaking. I would not recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to fill the gap between my pickup truck rear window and my cap/topper window. Worked fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Tube had a hole in it, and I did not get around to installing it until after the return period had expired, says it can no longer be returned :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast. Great Deal. Hard to find with the COV-10 issues right now
customer_reviews.author: Jiovanni S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made inner tube
customer_reviews.text: I poked a hole in the first one I bought but it was my fault. The second one worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the very right price
customer_reviews.text: I looked for several options and end-up choosing this product to replace a bad tube in my son's bike. The price is right and it worked beautifully. Can't say how long it will last, but my son rides a mountain bike pretty hard, to it's getting some tough use...
customer_reviews.author: Walkar

customer_reviews.title: held up sor far
customer_reviews.text: installed on 24" girls bike meant for primarily smooth on road use but has been used on some dirt and pretty bumpy secondary roads. It's taken all in stride so far 1 yr. plus so guess it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are crap. I purchase two of them and they popped within 10 minutes of been installed.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Santana

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I will be installing slime tire repair in these so they'll be virtually no maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: 1hapiflip

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very nicely made. Was very easy to install and has lasted a year thus far with a crazy 14 year old. Quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vicknair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked like it should its a standard tube so don't expect much it will get the work done.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It is a rubber intertube.
customer_reviews.text: What more do you really expect. Put on new tires and tubes on the old bike to fix it. So far they are working great. They were not very expensive either.
customer_reviews.author: Andréa B.

customer_reviews.title: Parts is Parts
customer_reviews.text: Good basic inner tube. Nothing fancy. Gets the job done. I like to have a couple of spares on hand, and these work fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rainman

customer_reviews.title: Typical tube
customer_reviews.text: These are regular old tubes, if you run new style bmx tires that are thin you may find that popping a tire is easy. I recommend buying either a beefy tire or a beefy tube to avoid flats.
customer_reviews.author: P. C. Faust

customer_reviews.title: Bought two for an old bike...
customer_reviews.text: ...and they've done a great job for over a year now. Easy to install and they've been holding air ever since. What can I say, they're bike tubes!
customer_reviews.author: celt-rock

customer_reviews.title: Correct size
customer_reviews.text: I have a slow leak and my tire continually went flat. I ordered this inner tube and installed it on my bike. Perfect fit and no more flat tires.
customer_reviews.author: Polka Dot

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed to fix my daughter's bike. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: 09RT

customer_reviews.title: Bike tube
customer_reviews.text: Good bike tube for the price, easy to install still holding up after a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Dirkjc

customer_reviews.title: Standard tubes are just fine
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing the tubes along with new tires just because of age. They seem like great standard weight tubes. Call me old fashioned, but I still like to put a little coat of baby powder on tubes during installation.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yeh

customer_reviews.title: replacement tube works
customer_reviews.text: installed and inflated in 3 minutes.. not much to say a bout a tube... price was great and quality and package appeared good
customer_reviews.author: TomC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tube. Good fit. Holds air well and works great with the wide tire I use it with.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: good tubes/reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about an inner tube? Installed a month ago, and they are holding pressure nicely. I say OK.
customer_reviews.author: DickW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best bang for you buck over all the tubes out there
customer_reviews.author: Tez

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Well priced, easy install, no complaints at all. Cons: N/A
customer_reviews.author: Edward Werbachowski Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bell Universal Bicycle Tube 24"
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to replace the original cut tube on the front tire of my bicycle and one for backup in case the original back tire tube malfunctioned. Good thing because the first tube got damaged by the spokes and I had to use the backup tube after repairing the problem on my bike. The tube fits great and my bike is up and running again, no problems with the replacement tubes. They were just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hatchchili

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Schwinn 24" girl mountain bike.
customer_reviews.text: Works find on my Schwinn 24" girl mountain bike after a third leak in the original tube.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good tubes. I've only had them on my wife's bike for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Schultz

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: sized correctly. good price. fast shipping. no complaints. will do business with them again when it comes time to change out tubes again.
customer_reviews.author: Diddy

customer_reviews.title: Good Tubes So Far
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son's bike well and are holding air approximately two weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: diverdude

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described . Will buy again when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: simple straightforward
customer_reviews.text: I got what I expected to get, and it works like it should. When it comes to bike tires, who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Moser

customer_reviews.title: In the bag for spares
customer_reviews.text: Cant see what there is to review except they hold air fine??? I keep 1 in the bag for a spare also.
customer_reviews.author: MnWild

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacement tube. Does what its supposed to do well.
customer_reviews.author: sivab

customer_reviews.title: tire tube purchase
customer_reviews.text: good tire good price in a timely manner. installed the tube in a three wheeler adult bicycle without an incident
customer_reviews.author: hg wolpin

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than at local bike store and works just as good. Product met our needs and quality standard as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was very generic, didnt say Bell brand anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was very generic, didnt say Bell brand anywhere. It was the correct size and so far has held up so I'll give it a mid grade for that.
customer_reviews.author: Viiiballer

customer_reviews.title: My tube didnt hold up
customer_reviews.text: Tube would not stay inflated after install. My Schwin also had a defective tire tube one tube had problems since the original purchase after less then a year, tires were always deflating after a few weeks, not sure if there is a defect with the bike that's causing this and may just have to take it in, prefer not to do that on such a basic part/job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: no problems here got what i ordered on time. ron smith
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hold air well
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my sons bike a month ago and they still have not lost any air. Good tubes
customer_reviews.author: GA Classroom Gift Card

customer_reviews.title: Good products
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Install in an hour for front and back tires. It is nice looking. I think it is going to last.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY

product_meta.title: Bell Standard and Self Sealing Bike Tubes
product_meta.description: 12-1/2", Self Sealing Bike Inner Tube, Sealant Inside Seals Most Holes Up To 1/8" Instantly While You Ride, Fits Tires With Width Range 1.75" - 2.25".
feature_bullets: Mold cured rubber for consistent side wall–prevents high pressure blow outs
High quality, reliably tested inner tube
Valve type & length: Schrader; 35mm with cap
Great for Cruiser and Mountain bike tires
